tweets.text: We have reviewed the application to the @EnvAgency for tunnel approval. The document and the supporting reports are missing critical borehole logs and reports around the sensitive R Misbourne crossing locations at Chalfont St Giles and Shardeloes Lake. Why????

Daily dose of poisonous hydrogen sulphide has arrived early in Hartshill-c5 miles from Walleys Landfill-today. Normally get gassed evening/night time. No chance we can go along with government COVID guidance to keep homes ventilated.  #StopTheStink @PHE_uk @EnvAgencyMids

urls.title: Environment Agency launches educational tools for WOD to ‚Äòhelp marine life thrive‚Äô - Preventing Plastic Pollution
urls.description: Schools across England will mark World Ocean Day (WOD) next month (Tuesday, June 8) by exploring the journey of plastic with the Environment Agency. Primary and secondary schools are invited to view a series of online films and activities via an interactive map in advance of the event, culminating in a live question and answer sessio n with Environment Agency and World Wildlife Fund experts on the actual day. By clicking on different points of the map, students can learn how plastic pollution travels

tweets.text:
Ahead of #WorldOceanDay, we've developed an interactive tool for primary and secondary school students to show how plastic pollution travels to the ocean.

If you're a teacher, parent or guardian, read more here:
https://t.co/YvPDT5eR45 

@Plastic_EU #STEMEducation https://t.co/aU627GeQJx

tweets.text: Our Windrush neighbour the River Coln is dying and the @EnvAgency just lets it happen. Sound familiar? @Feargal_Sharkey @tomheapmedia https://t.co/j5b4e08b6g

Left my window open last night & I just woke up, panicking that I could smell gas. I soon realised that it was the landfill, 4 miles away. If the smell is that potent & horrific here, I can‚Äôt bare to imagine what it must be like for those much closer üòî#StopTheStink @Cap_it_off

@DrMickSalt @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids It would be interesting for the @EnvAgency and @PHE_EoEngland to give us more interpretation of the figures as they come out so we have an understanding of what they explicitly mean. PM inc 2.5 and methane have had the same spikes as H2S yet we hear more about H2S #stopthestink

@SianieRoo @EnvAgency The MMFs are monitoring PM1, PM2.5, PM4 & PM10. However, according to my tamed, anonymous PM expert, they believe that only PM2.5 and PM10 are being measured explicitly, with an interpolation algorithm used to generate the other two. @EnvAgencyMids, please could you comment?

I‚Äôd be very interested to know more about particulate matter in Newcastle under Lyme @DrMickSalt , is this something the @EnvAgency are looking into as part of their monitoring? #stopthestink https://t.co/HaGsRfkULC
Please could you publish the actions that the operator must take by 1st June? Are these just recommendations or an official enforcement notice? https://t.co/VsLn1sTnP2

@a_merrydew @mrssusanlomax @SianieRoo @AaronBell4NUL @scottdegg @RedIndustries2 @BorisJohnson @pow_rebecca @NewsNBC @SimonTagg @MPGeorgeEustice @EnvAgency @Sotlive @WHO I love the ‚Äú we are a law abiding business ‚Äú bit and the disrespect for the law headline , coming from an ex con too . It kind of diluted his message a bit I think . Somehow the dangerously high levels of h2s is somewhat irrefutable evidence as legally monitored .

The agencies need to act on the high volume of complaints and symptoms. That's the evidence.
